commit.message:
re PR c++/18758 (ICE redeclaring struct as template)

cp:
	PR c++/18758
	* parser.c (cp_parser_class_head): Return NULL_TREE when
	push_template_decl fails.  Update comment.
testsuite:
	PR 18758
	* g++.dg/parse/crash21.C: New.

From-SVN: r91636

+	push_template_decl fails.  Update comment.
